name:
Two Point Campus
I love simulation games and I love academic life. I always knew I'd enjoy Two Point Campus, and now I've been able to try it during their free weekend on #Steam. It's on sale, so I'm getting it! It runs great on the #SteamDeck, though the controls are a bit finicky sometimes.store.steampowered.com/app/164#Gaming #TwoPointCampus #FreeWeekend

name: Well, I couldn't help myself. If I see an Elric story, chances are I'll but it. Even if I read it before.They had a pretty decent copy of Epic Illustrated #14 at Casablanca Comics. It includes the story "While the Gods Laugh" with art by P. Craig Russell. How could I not buy it, at $6?#Comics
content: Well, I couldn't help myself. If I see an Elric story, chances are I'll but it. Even if I read it before.They had a pretty decent copy of Epic Illustrated #14 at Casablanca Comics. It includes the story "While the Gods Laugh" with art by P. Craig Russell. How could I not buy it, at $6?#Comics

name: It's a gorgeous day here in Portland, #Maine today. I'm using my lunch hour to walk around. My destination is the Old Port. There's a comic book shop there I want to check out.#Selfie #SelfieTherapy #GaySelfie #GayMastodon
